price: 74. ¿Es que no van a volverse a Al-lah en arrepentimiento y a pedirle perdón? Y Al-lah es Indulgente y Misericordioso.
arabic: أَفَلَا يَتُوبُونَ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ وَيَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَهُۥۚ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: afalā yatūbūna ilā al-lahi wayastaghfirūnahu wal-lahu ghafūrun raḥīmun
